BSF Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 1121 Head Constable Posts
Prasanna / All Government Jobs / Aug 13, 2025, 15:44 IST
 Border Security Force
 1,121 Jobs |  Posted On : 13-Aug-2025 |  Delhi |  Salary : 25,500 to 81,100




FOLLOW

The Border Security Force (BSF) has declared the latest job notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for 1121 Head Constable Posts. Those candidates who have qualified in the 10th Pass, 12th, and ITI can grab this chance and apply for these posts. Here, we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for the BSF Recruitment 2025. Interested and eligible candidates can apply online through the website on or before the last date of application. For more details, visit the official website.




If you are looking for more, here is a list of Government Jobs in 2025 that you can all apply for. Use this link for more jobs in Delhi.

BSF Recruitment 2025 - Eligibility Criteria
Name of the Posts	No.of Vacancies	Qualification
Head Constable 	1121	10th Pass, 12th, ITI

Age Limit for the BSF Recruitment 2025

The Minimum Age Limit: 18 years.
The Maximum Age Limit: 25 years.
Age Relaxation is applicable as per norms.

Selection Process for the BSF Recruitment 2025

Physical Standard Test
Physical Efficiency Test
Computer-Based Test
Document Verification
Dictation Test
Paragraph Reading Test
Medical Examination

Salary Structure for the BSF Recruitment 2025

The Minimum Salary: Rs. 25,500 /- per month
The Maximum Salary: Rs. 81,100 /- per month.

Application fee for the BSF Recruitment 2025

UR, EWS, OBC Candidates: Rs. 100/-
Female, SC, ST, Ex-Servicemen Candidates: Nil
How to Apply for the BSF Recruitment 2025
Visit the official website.
Go to the recruitment or career page.
Check for the Head Constable Jobs 2025.
Read the notification carefully.
Check the eligibility criteria.
If you meet the eligibility criteria.
Click on the Apply Online link.
Register with your email and password.
Fill out the given details carefully.
Pay the application fee (if applicable).
Submit the application form and capture the application number for further reference.

Important Dates

Starting Date of Application	24-08-2025
Last Date of Application	23-09-2025

 

Apply Online	Click Here
Official Notification	Click Here

Join on Telegram	Join Now
